title: Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Australian_Broadcasting_Corporation_Logo_4715.png)
  
Any idea what font the ’ABC’ is in?
 [‹ saw his head\*discovery channel](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824/http:/typophile.com/node/40197 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ron Paul BLIMP (font inquiry) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824/http:/typophile.com/node/40212 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kewpid

comments.content:
Hi Dan,  
I’d say custom, inspired by [Minerva Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/minerva-modern/regular/) and [Britannic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/extra-light/).  
F
I second Florian. It’s also kind of similar to [Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115824/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Peignot).
